history.content: During phase 2, if you are declared you can enroll directly into the class provided there is space. You can only enroll directly during phase 1 if you have senior standing on telebears. During phase 1 you can add yourself to the waitlist if you are declared. Waitlist is processed manually, so I'm assuming you will have priority on the waitlist, but keep in mind that nonmajokrs can't even add to the waitlist until phase 2, so at that point eh waitlist is mostly full of declared people anyway.

I have read the "Getting into CS Classes" page, but I am confused about what happens if you are a declared LSCS major, and try to enroll in an upper div CS class (like CS 160) during Phase 2.

If there is room in the class, do you automatically get in?

Do you get waitlisted regardless?

If you waitlist yourself in Phase II, do you still have priority in the waitlist?

Thanks!
history.subject: Enrolling in an upper div CS class as declared LSCS
